bug.author: awaelchli
bug.summary: Replace AttributeDict in with dict in checkpoint
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>ðŸš€ Feature</denchmark-h>
When we save hyperparameters to the checkpoint, we save them in a Lightning datastructure called AttributeDict. We should replace this with a regular dict when saving the checkpoint. <denchmark-h:h3>Motivation</denchmark-h>
Allows loading checkpoints with torch.load in environments where Lightning is not installed. <denchmark-h:h3>Pitch</denchmark-h>
Convert AttributeDict to dict when saving, convert dict to AttributeDict when loading. cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Borda>@Borda</denchmark-link>
